properties.areaDesc: Crawford, GA; Peach, GA; Bibb, GA; Houston, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 11:02AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Echeconnee Creek near Byron affecting Bibb...Crawford...Houston
and Peach Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Echeconnee Creek near Byron.
* From this morning until further notice.
* At 10 AM Friday the stage was 15.1 feet...and rising.
* Flood stage is 15 feet.
* At 15 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands
occurs upstream and downstream from the gage on Houston Road.
Portions of creek access roads and low lying areas will begin to
flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
